MUNICIPAL BUILDING
NEW YORK 7, N. Y.
WHHtMII 3-3600
June 23, 1954
Dr. Harry J. Skornia
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
I am enclosing herewith a published copy of the Statute of the
Prix Italia. The Statute in English starts on page 21. You
will notice under paragraph 3 that there are two prizes - one
for a musical composition with words, and the other for a
literary or dramatic work with or without music.
I call your attention also to page 33 re the Italian Press Association
prize for a Radio Documentary.
Since NAEB will be on the Music Jury this year, we cannot submit
any musical entries. We can submit a literary or dramatic work
with or without music and an "artistic, literary or scientific
documentary, a reportage or a magazine programme, created
specially for broadcasting".
Please note that we must provide a taped copy of the Entry as
well as a French translation of same. A statement of permissions
from the author is also required.
